name: #4 "Surprise"
description:
Surprise: is a state of emotional alteration, resulting from an unexpected or unforeseen event.It can have any valence, that is, it can be neutral, pleasant or unpleasant.

This is the fourth piece of the collection "diorama of emotions" which consists of 16 pieces inspired by the wheel of emotions created by psychologist Robert Plutchik.

In this work, surprise is covered from several points of view. On the one hand, the surprise of the shipwrecked sailor when he finds a shark while planning his escape, and on the other hand, the surprise of the spectator when he discovers that the island is located over a ruined city, which also generates curiosity. Why is this city there ? what happened ? allows the imagination to run wild.
 The surprise is a trigger for many other emotions, anger, happiness, sadness, fear, etc.
it is up to us which other emotion will awaken
